CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 5, 1969, pg. 17 reads: "Recently Wed - Mr. and Mrs. Walter Scott Jr., were recently married by the Rev. Eugene Roberts of First Baptist Church, Penn Hills. The bride is the former Ida Mae Edwards, daughter of Mrs. Evalina Edwards.  The groom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Charles Walter Scott."
TitMainTitle: Bride Ida Mae Edwards Scott wearing sleeveless empire waist dress with lace panels, ready to feed cake to groom Walter Scott Jr.posed in front of three tiered wedding cake, in interior with peacock decoration, Penn Hills
